name: xlwings-web-fastapi
description: Use Python with Google Sheets or Excel on the web via xlwings.

XLWINGS_LICENSE_KEY.description: Head over to https://www.xlwings.org/trial to get your trial key, then paste it here.

XLWINGS_API_KEY.description: This is a random key. Once installation finishes, you'll find it under your app's Settings > Config Vars > Reveal Config Vars.
